title: 1.13检测背包
author: cf2b
txt_content: 求教原版1.13用什么指令来检测背包，testfor这个指令不能用了

replies.author: Belanga
replies.txt_content: /execute if entity @a[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:物品id"}]}] run （你要执行的命令）复制代码

replies.author: cf2b
replies.txt_content:
Belanga 发表于 2018-10-21 17:52
能用，谢谢了

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content: 若要改变执行者，请使用as而不是if entity

replies.author: cf2b
replies.txt_content:
ruhuasiyu 发表于 2018-10-21 18:15
若要改变执行者，请使用as而不是if entity
知道了
